blogPost.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
blogPost.body: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
blogPost.title: SVG Color Matrix Mixer - Generate nice looking color matrix filters for your images
blogPost.author: Rik Schennink

localize.description: 创建一个好看的SVG颜色矩阵滤镜是很棘手的。这个免费的网络应用可以帮助你轻松地为你的图片创建正确的颜色矩阵。添加对比度、亮度、色调和饱和度滤镜或同时调整一个或多个矩阵值。
localize.tagline: 为您的图像生成漂亮的彩色矩阵滤镜。

localize.description: 創建一個好看的SVG顏色矩陣濾鏡是很棘手的。這個免費的網絡應用可以幫助你輕鬆地爲你的圖片創建正確的顏色矩陣。添加對比度、亮度、色調和飽和度濾鏡或同時調整一個或多個矩陣值。
localize.tagline: 爲您的圖像生成漂亮的彩色矩陣濾鏡。
